metadata.title: CVE-2023-5479 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Extensions API in Google Chrome prior to118.0.5993.70 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to bypass an enterprise policy via a crafted HTML page.(Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
